      • generateSession

        public User generateSession(java.lang.String clientCode,
                            java.lang.String password)
                     throws SmartAPIException,
                            org.json.JSONException,
                            java.io.IOException
        Do the token exchange with the `request_token` obtained after the login flow, and retrieve the `access_token` required for all subsequent requests.
        Parameters:
        requestToken - received from login process.
        apiSecret - which is unique for each aap.
        Returns:
        User is the user model which contains user and session details.
        Throws:
        SmartAPIException
        SmartAPIException - is thrown for all SmartAPI trade related errors.
        org.json.JSONException - is thrown when there is exception while parsing response.
        java.io.IOException - is thrown when there is connection error.

      • renewAccessToken

        public TokenSet renewAccessToken(java.lang.String accessToken,
                                 java.lang.String refreshToken)
                          throws java.io.IOException,
                                 SmartAPIException,
                                 org.json.JSONException
        Get a new access token using refresh token.
        Parameters:
        refreshToken - is the refresh token obtained after generateSession.
        apiSecret - is unique for each app.
        Returns:
        TokenSet contains user id, refresh token, api secret.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - is thrown when there is connection error.
        SmartAPIException - is thrown for all SmartAPI trade related errors.
        org.json.JSONException

      • sha256Hex

        public java.lang.String sha256Hex(java.lang.String str)
        Hex encodes sha256 output for android support.
        Parameters:
        str - is the String that has to be encrypted.
        Returns:
        Hex encoded String.

        Profile is a POJO which contains profile related data.

      • placeOrder

        public Order placeOrder(OrderParams orderParams,
                        java.lang.String variety)
                 throws SmartAPIException,
                        org.json.JSONException,
                        java.io.IOException
        Places an order.
        Parameters:
        orderParams - is Order params.
        variety - variety="regular". Order variety can be bo, co, amo, regular.
        Returns:
        Order contains only orderId.
        Throws:
        SmartAPIException - is thrown for all SmartAPI trade related errors.
        org.json.JSONException - is thrown when there is exception while parsing response.
        java.io.IOException - is thrown when there is connection error.

      • modifyOrder

        public Order modifyOrder(java.lang.String orderId,
                         OrderParams orderParams,
                         java.lang.String variety)
                  throws SmartAPIException,
                         org.json.JSONException,
                         java.io.IOException
        Modifies an open order.
        Parameters:
        orderParams - is Order params.
        variety - variety="regular". Order variety can be bo, co, amo, regular.
        orderId - order id of the order being modified.
        Returns:
        Order object contains only orderId.
        Throws:
        SmartAPIException - is thrown for all SmartAPI trade related errors.
        org.json.JSONException - is thrown when there is exception while parsing response.
        java.io.IOException - is thrown when there is connection error.

      • cancelOrder

        public Order cancelOrder(java.lang.String orderId,
                         java.lang.String variety)
                  throws SmartAPIException,
                         org.json.JSONException,
                         java.io.IOException
        Cancels an order.
        Parameters:
        orderId - order id of the order to be cancelled.
        variety - [variety="regular"]. Order variety can be bo, co, amo, regular.
        Returns:
        Order object contains only orderId.
        Throws:
        SmartAPIException - is thrown for all Angel trade related errors.
        org.json.JSONException - is thrown when there is exception while parsing response.
        java.io.IOException - is thrown when there is connection error.

      • getOrderHistory

        public java.util.List<Order> getOrderHistory(java.lang.String clientId)
                                      throws SmartAPIException,
                                             java.io.IOException,
                                             org.json.JSONException
        Returns list of different stages an order has gone through.
        Parameters:
        orderId - is the order id which is obtained from orderbook.
        Returns:
        List of multiple stages an order has gone through in the system.
        Throws:
        SmartAPIException - is thrown for all Smart API trade related errors.
        SmartAPIException - is thrown for all Smart API trade related errors.
        java.io.IOException - is thrown when there is connection error.
        org.json.JSONException

      • getLTP

        public org.json.JSONObject getLTP(java.lang.String exchange,
                                  java.lang.String tradingSymbol,
                                  java.lang.String symboltoken)
                           throws SmartAPIException,
                                  java.io.IOException,
                                  org.json.JSONException
        Retrieves last price. User can either pass exchange with tradingsymbol or instrument token only. For example {NSE:NIFTY 50, BSE:SENSEX} or {256265, 265}.
        Parameters:
        instruments - is the array of tradingsymbol and exchange or instruments token.
        Returns:
        Map of String and LTPQuote.
        Throws:
        SmartAPIException - is thrown for all Smart API trade related errors.
        java.io.IOException - is thrown when there is connection related error.
        org.json.JSONException
